title: Glutathione | Journal of Thyroid Cancer
author: Open Access Pub
description: The Journal of Thyroid Cancer is dedicated to publishing peer-reviewed articles related to the field of Glutathione in an open access platform
cleaned_text: Related Article For "Glutathione" About (1) results ISSN: 2574-4496 Editor-in-chief: Giovanni Mauri, European Institute of Oncolgy Open Access Journal Description: Most nodules are cysts filled with fluid or with a stored form of thyroid hormone called colloid. Solid nodules have little fluid or colloid. These nodules are more likely to be cancerous than are fluid-filled nodules. Some types of solid nodules, such as hyperplastic nodules and adenomas, have too many cells, but the cells are not cancer cells.
